    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddEventController
    Controller for adding a new event.
    Admin
    Represents an admin user in the club.
    Announcement
    Represents an announcement in the club.
    App
    Main application class for the club management system.
    BaseController
    Base controller class for the application.
    Club
    Represents a club with members, admins, events, and announcements.
    DashboardController
    Controller for managing the dashboard view.
    DatabaseManager
    Manages the database connection and initialization.
    DataManager
    Manages data persistence and retrieval for the club application.
    EditEventController
    Controller for editing an existing event.
    EditMemberController
    Controller for editing an existing member's details.
    Event
    Represents an event in the club.
    EventAction
    Represents possible actions that can occur to an event.
    EventListController
    Controller for managing the event list view.
    EventManager
    Manages club events, registrations, and notifications.
    EventObserver
    Interface for observers of event changes.
    LoginController
    Controller for managing the login functionality.
    MainApp
    The MainApp class serves as the entry point for launching the application.
    Member
    Represents a member of the club.
    MemberListController
    Controller for managing the member list view.
    MembershipManager
    Manages club membership operations including registration, renewals, and status changes.
    MembershipRecord
    Represents a historical record of a member's status changes.
    MembershipStatus
    Represents the possible states of a club membership.
    Person
    Represents a generic person in the club.
    ProfileController
    Controller for managing the profile view.
    SignUpController
    Controller for managing the sign-up process.
